fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020, Nature Based Solutions in Renaturing the Cities, VAT Directive, Public Procurement Directive.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Branchevereniging VHG is aangesloten bij de Nederlandse werkgeverskoepels MKB Nederland en VNO-NCW. Daarnaast is de vereniging aangesloten bij de Europese koepels ELCA, EILO en EAC.
goals__remit: Branchevereniging VHG behartigt de belangen van de hoveniers- en groenvoorzienersbedrijven in Nederland.
